item.description: The Art of Logging https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=33054741 Tags: imported, hacker-news Id: 02a22390-c1a1-11ed-b61a-0242ac110004 Read: Sun Oct 2 10:42:15 2022 “Rust is safe” is not some kind of absolute guarantee of code safety https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=33056077 Tags: imported, hacker-news Id: 12483f20-c1a4-11ed-84be-0242ac110004 Read: Sun Oct 2 14:20:21 2022 Have lots of AWS accounts Using the physical separation of your AWS accounts as a way to isolate the data and services https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=33069547 Tags: aws, aws-account, physical-isolation, isolation, data-isolation, risk-management, imported, hacker-news
